is-absolute-url

Check if an URL is absolute

Install

sh $ npm install --save is-absolute-url

Usage

```js var isAbsoluteUrl = require(‘is-absolute-url’);

isAbsoluteUrl(‘http://sindresorhus.com/foo/bar’); //=> true

isAbsoluteUrl(‘//sindresorhus.com’); //=> false

isAbsoluteUrl(‘foo/bar’); //=> false ```

Related

See is-relative-url for the inverse.
